snippet: This past week in Indianapolis, six Giants players who played in the memorable Super Bowl in 2008 chose to emphasize the differences between the two teams rather than the similarities.
lead_paragraph: This past week in Indianapolis, six Giants players who played in the memorable Super Bowl in 2008 chose to emphasize the differences between the two teams rather than the similarities.

headline.seo: Giants vs. Patriots — Super Bowl XLVI: It’s Different This Time
headline.main: Super Bowl XLVI: For the Giants, It’s Different This Time
